title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.34 - Smoking or carrying of lighted cigars, cigarettes, pipes, etc., in certain areas of the terminal prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.34 - Smoking or carrying of lighted cigars, cigarettes, pipes, etc., in certain areas of the terminal prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall smoke or carry lighted cigars, cigarettes, pipes, matches or any naked flame in a truck terminal except in
areas where smoking is expressly permitted by the Port

Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.34

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
